name: Hippie Tabs in Javascript
tagline: An extendable tab system with events and customizability
body:
# Hippie Tab Control System using JQuery This is an extendable tab system that only requires you have an `ul` element on the page. It uses jQuery or Zepto and ties into event listeners for each thing it does. ## Set Up ``` HippieTabs Demo
    ``` ## Manipulating Tabs ### createTab `hippieTabs.createTab(,<tabid>);` `hippieTabs.createTab(<title>,<tabid>,<data>);` _Examples_ `hippieTabs.createTab("Browse Music", "musicbrowser");` `hippieTabs.createTab("Search Library", "query1", "genre=Rock;artist=Miike Snow");` ### removeTabById `hippieTabs.removeTabById(<string>);` _Example_ `hippieTabs.removeTabById("query1");` ### activateTabById `hippieTabs.activateTabById(<string>);` _Example_ `hippieTabs.activateTabById("musicbrowser");` ## Events ### htabcreate ``` hippieTabs.on( "htabcreate", function(event, htabid, htabdata, tabtitle) { //called upon creation of a tab }) ``` ### htabclose ``` hippieTabs.on( "htabclose", function(event, htabid, htabdata) { //called when the tab begins closing animation }) ``` ### htabactivate ``` hippieTabs.on( "htabctivate", function(event, htabid, htabdata) { //called when a tab is selected }) ```
